Log the user in to their Sendible account and direct to the login page.

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v1/singlesignon

====Formats:====
xml, json

====HTTP Methods:====
GET

====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password or remote API key belonging to the Sendible user.

====Parameters:====
 * {{{application_id}}}: Your application id from http://sendible.com/developers.
 * {{{redirect_to}}}: The URL to direct users to after signing in.

====Error Response:====
{{{
<error>
<type>InvalidUsernamePassword</type>
<message>Username/password is invalid.</message>
</error>
}}}
